name: sfpowerscript-exportsourcefromorg-task
friendlyName: Export Source from the provided org using metadata api
description: Export source from any org for storing to backup or further analysis, This task is part of SFPowerscripts
helpMarkDown: Export the entire metadata from the org utilizing mdapi, which can be used for further analyis
author: dxatscale@accenture.com

inputs.name: target_org
inputs.label: Alias or username of the target org
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alias or username of the target org where the code should be deployed

inputs.name: source_directory
inputs.label: Directory to which the source should be exported to
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory to which the source should be exported to

inputs.name: quickFilter
inputs.label: Exclude Managed Package Components
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated values  of metadata type, member or file names to be excluded while building the manifest

inputs.name: isManagedPackageComponentsToBeExcluded
inputs.label: Exclude Managed Package Components
inputs.helpMarkDown: Exclued managed package components from the export

inputs.name: isUnzipEnabled
inputs.label: Unzip the exported metadata/source from the zip into the provided folder

OutputVariables.name: sfpowerscripts_exportedsource_zip_path
OutputVariables.description: The path to the zip file which has the exported source (if unzip option is not selected)
